EmailTemplate.name: 202007_Global_CH_Training-Program_Global-Comm.202007_Global_Email_CPTrainingComm
EmailTemplate.subject: Check out our new on-demand dealer’s webinars page
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Honeywell Aerospace's live webinars give our dealers a chance to take part in a virtual learning experience.
By joining our training sessions, you can watch interactive presentations, taught by subject matter experts who are leaders in their respective industries, covering a broad spectrum of topics.
But what if you missed it?
Thinking about our dealers’ tight schedules, Honeywell implemented this new on-demand training and webinars tool, that can be accessed here:
https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/partner-resources/cp-webinars-trainings <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/learn/about-us/partner-resources/cp-webinars-trainings]]>
The new on demand webinars page provides an engaging and learning-rich environment that can be accessed anytime and anywhere through the Internet.
It’s easy-to-use and is customized to meet each of our dealers’ learning & development needs.
We’re excited to launch this new training & development initiative and we’re here to support you every step of the way!
Honeywell’s on demand webinars page is raising the bar for your professional development and growth!
Sincerely,
Honeywell Aerospace Channel Partner Training Team
